Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The Blood Guard is gaining a foothold against us.

Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:33#10#Blood Guard mages}, {@LinkCreature:33#11#berserkers}, {@LinkCreature:33#12#lancers}, {@LinkCreature:33#60#sorcerers}, {@LinkCreature:33#61#reapers}, {@LinkCreature:33#62#champions}, and {@LinkCreature:33#70#arcanists}.

Report to Celion when mission is complete.
It's a reward from the federation. Blessings to all the members of the guild!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
